entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is described as impati ent and coolly repeating Mrs. Figg's description of dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as big, wearing cloaks, having an eerie way of moving, a rotting smell, and making a rattling noise.

entities.name: mrs. figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is described as saying that dementors were big and wearing cloaks, with a pink flush creeping up her neck.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as snorting derisively at Madam Bones' description of dementors.
